name: Urbo
description: Urbo is a platform that allows people to find and connect with local business, events and offers.

name: ZnapMonitor
description: A platform designed to track a topic in social media (twitter, facebook) and your organization users impact on that topic.

name: Inspire Marketplace CRM
description: Online store - custom CRM with booking capabilities, client management and multiple stores domain

name: Real State CRM
description: A custom made real state CRM with properties mapping to a image diagram, prospects management, multi-tenant real state developments, sellers management, etc.

name: Georeferencing platform of crime profiles
description: A project for the local justice bureau, that aimed to help in the representation of the crime records in the Pachuca metropolitan area.

name: Custom CRM: ELAM
description: A custom CRM for a truck assembler company. Modules included international logistics, storage, sells, assembly line production, accountability and customer service.

name: SleepyLand
description: SleepyLand was a mobile app which introduced memorable and fun characters to kids, and let them call their favourite one via a 'call center' like service directly from the app.

name: Euphorye
description: Euphorye is an accountant software designed to comply with the Mexican laws, it made the managing of invoices simple, yet flexible enoguh to adapt to any organization.

name: Custom Job Bank platform
description: A Job Bank for the Miguel Hidalgo Municipality in Mexico City.
imgAlt: Bolsa de trabajo delegacion Miguel Hidalgo
